title: Create 8-bit ALU RTL test design
description:
Create test RTL designs for verification concepts.

COMPLETED:
1. Simple 8-bit integer ALU (concepts/rtl/alu_8bit/)

   - Zero, Overflow, Carry flags
   - Python BFM for golden reference

2. IEEE-754 32-bit FP ALU (concepts/rtl/fp_alu_32bit/)
   - Source: UVM_Machine project
   - Floating-point: ADD, SUB, MUL, DIV
   - Logical: AND, OR, XOR, shifts, complement
   - Float-to-integer conversion
   - Complete UVM testbench with coverage
   - SystemVerilog reference model

Spec References:
- File 2: 'ALU.v module'
- UVM_Machine: https://anonymous.4open.science/r/UVM_Machine-7806

title: E2E: iterative coverage closure loop
description:
Concept script: Full coverage closure loop with LLM stimulus generation.

Spec Reference: File 2 - 'Episode ends when coverage saturates'

Workflow:
1. Run initial tests, collect coverage
2. Parse coverage holes
3. LLM generates new test vectors
4. Run tests, collect new coverage
5. Repeat until coverage saturates or max iterations

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] concepts/track-a-simulation/06-coverage-closure/
- [ ] coverage_loop.py orchestrating the loop
- [ ] Visualization of coverage progression
- [ ] Stop condition: delta < threshold or max_iters
- [ ] Full documentation of results

Dependencies: All Track A simulation tasks
